item.description:
Many of you know of my work with Arm2Arm. Maryse Adonis takes two wonderful mission trips to Haiti and the DOminican Republic each year to bring much needed medical and dental supplies and care to severely impoverised Haitian people in both countries. She also has a school which is run by Arm2Arm. This has been a rough year, and she came very close to cancelling her July trip. A portion of the proceeds from this event will go to her cause and ensure that her great works continues.

Read about Arm2Arm here: http://arm2arm.net/

The cover charge for comedy night is $15.00. Voluntary support of Arm2Arm is $10.00 for a total charge of $25.00 per person.

The comedians are great, and the atmosphere at Funky Monkey is wonderful, intimate, and offers lots of tasty treats. Comedy night is fun, since there are several different performers, offering "something for everyone" and a nice, full evening. Come give it a try!

Funky's website: http://thefunkymonkeycafe.com/

***It is a REALLY good idea to RSVP in advance, since comedy nights, even without a fundraiser, always sell out!**** 

RSVP:  (203) 439-9161
thefunkymonkeycafe@gmail.com

The show starts at 8, but try to get there early to get you food and drinks! This venue does serve beer and wine as well as coffee, teas, sandwiches, salads, desserts.
item.name: Funky Monkey COMEDY to support Arm2Arm!
